FuncDef: The display local-aaa-user password policy command displays the password policy of local users. The display local-aaa-user password policy command displays the password policy of local users.
CLIs: display local-aaa-user password policy { administrator | access-user }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the password policy of local administrators.
-

Displays the password policy of local access users.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
-
